product_name: Boardworks Sirena Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Featuring a beautiful mermaid graphic, the Boardworks Sirena Adjustable Stand Up Paddle offers a lightweight, full carbon-fiber shaft and adjustable collar clamp system. Carbon fiber shaft provides an extremely lightweight connection to the water. Adjustable length caters to multiple paddlers or multiple paddling applications; adjusts from 66.5 - 92 in. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes. ABS edge insert for toughness.
short_description: Featuring a beautiful mermaid graphic, the Boardworks Sirena Adjustable Stand Up Paddle offers a lightweight, full carbon-fiber shaft and adjustable collar clamp system.
